$Id$
The files in this directory came from a CD that was given to Professor
Lee in May, 2000

These files are checked into the CVS repository
OCP-INSTALL.html  - Installation instructions
Version Description Documentation.doc - version information

These files are not checked in, you can find them in
~ptII/vendors/ocp

OCP.tar.gz        - 10 Mb tar file version
OCP.zip		  - 12 Mb zip file
